text: Benjamin Schwartz (born September 15, 1981) is an American actor, comedian, director, producer and writer. He portrayed the role of Jean-Ralphio Saperstein on the NBC sitcom Parks and Recreation. == Other websites == * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from the Bronx Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television writers Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City
title: Ben Schwartz
